name: Polterdice
description:
Polterdice is a couch co-op multiplayer physics game where the players take the role of ghosts that can manipulate the results of dice.

Your objetctive is to kill every player in the rpg campaign by making every dice roll fumble.

Good luck keeping up with the challenge of managing multiple dice =)

Team: 

Elsio Perazzinni (Developer)

Rodrigo Forti (Game Designer/Developer)

JG Guimarães (Game Designer/Artist)

Kami Queiroz (Artist)
